overview: Viewers go on an exciting adventure as they travel back in time to follow a Christmas journey to freedom along the Underground Railroad. Featuring soloist Wintley Phipps as a slave named Joe; actress Gwendolyn Briley-Strand as Harriet Tubman; and historian Dr. Allen Callahan, this dramatic presentation helps viewers see how the humble birth of Jesus gives hope and freedom to all humankind.
title: A Christmas Journey to Freedom
